pages.text: 60|12|He nabi! Mumina narigana yakhana apanara kache kache ese ba'i’ata kare [1] e marme ye, tara allahara sathe kono sarika sthira karabe na, curi karabe na, byabhicara karabena, nijedera santanadera hatya karabe na, tara sajnane kono apabada racana kare ratabe na ebam satkaje apanake aman'ya karabe na, takhana apani tadera ba'i’ata grahana karuna ebam tadera jan'ya allahara kache ksama prarthana karuna. Niscaya allaha ksamasila, parama dayalu.
60|13|He muminagana! Allaha ye sampradayera prati rusta tomara tadera sathe bandhutba karo na, tara to akhirata samparke hatasa haye pareche yemana hatasa hayeche kaphirara kabarabasidera bisaye.
61|1|Asamanasamuhe ya kichu ache ebam yamine ya kichu ache saba'i allahara pabitrata o mahima ghosana kare. Ara tini prabalaparakramasali, prajnamaya.
61|2|He imanadaragana! Tomara ya kara na ta tomara kena bala
61|3|tomara ya kara na tomadera ta bala allahara drstite khuba'i asantosajanaka.
61|4|Niscaya yara allahara pathe yud'dha kare saribad'dhabhabe sudrrha pracirera mata, allaha taderake bhalobasena.

61|5|Ara smarana karuna, yakhana musa tamra sampradayake balechilena, ‘he amara sampradaya! Tomara amake kena kasta diccha athaca tomara jana ye, ami tomadera kache allahara rasula. Atahpara tara yakhana bamka patha abalambana karala takhana allah‌ tadera hrdayake bamka kare dilena. Ara allaha phasika sampradayake hedayata karena na.
